content:
# Responsible engineers for the need of a sustainable environment 2025

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/responsible-engineers-for-the-need-of-a-sustainable-environment-2025/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:39:50

Responsible engineers for the need of a sustainable environment 2025
We invite you to participate in a distinguished seminar       addressing the pivotal role of engineers in fostering a       sustainable future. This event will explore innovative       methodologies, ethical imperatives, and strategic frameworks       essential for addressing contemporary environmental challenges.       Join us in advancing the discourse on engineering solutions for a       resilient and sustainable world.

Date 2025.01.14; 08h00-13h00;

Place: AGH University, bld. C6, room 108;
